##### Boxplots

```{r}
for (species_input in protist_species) {
  
  response_variable = paste0(species_input, "_indiv_per_ml")
  
  print(plot.patches.boxplots(patch_type_input,
                              response_variable))
  
}
```

##### Mean +- 95%

```{r}
for (species_input in protist_species){
  
  response_variable = paste0(species_input, "_indiv_per_ml")
  
  print(plot.patches.points(patch_type_input,
                              response_variable))
  
}
```

##### Effect size

```{r}
for (species_input in protist_species){
  
  response_variable = paste0(species_input, "_indiv_per_ml", "_d")
  
  print(plot.patches.points.ES(patch_type_input,
                               response_variable))
  
}
```
